features: Save Space yet Powerful: Our home air purifier can cover an area up to 908ft², refreshing the air 5x per hour in rooms as large as 179 ft². Our Aircillin Air Purifier (6.75 x 6.75 x 10.62 in) is perfect for bedroom, office, kitchen, living room etc.

Maximum Speed Button: Press the Max Speed Mode button, the HEPA air purifier will run at full load, and clean air with the fastest speed. You can adjust the 4 wind speeds from Sleep to 1, 2, 3 gear, and set the timer from 1 to 8 hours, customizing air purification to suit your schedule.

Aromatherapy & Quiet Sleep Mode: Enhance your air purifier with aromatherapy. Add your favorite essential oils for a refreshing and calming atmosphere. Operates quietly for peaceful home. Sleep mode stays under 25 dB for a serene night.

Save Space yet Powerful: Our home air purifier can cover an area up to 690 sq.ft, cleans the air of 345 sq.ft in 0.5 hour. Our Aircillin Air Purifier (6.75 x 6.75 x 10.62 in) is perfect for bedroom, office, kitchen, living room etc.

Official Aircillin H13 HEPA Filters: CARB Certified, FCC Certified, and ETL Listed. Package includes: 1 purifier, 2 HEPA filters, 1 adapter. Search for B0CMCMDKY1 to find Aircillin replacement filter 4-Pack for AP1501, Search for B0CMCV7JFN to find Aircillin replacement filter 6-Pack for AP1501.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of power in a very small package!
reviews.reviewText: This air purifier is really compact, smaller than I expected, but able to move a lot of air quickly. It is very easy to transport from room to room. It requires clear space on two sides to draw in air. I keep it turned sideways near a wall, which allows it to pull air from its front and back sides, which are now turned sideways to the wall. By drawing in from two sides, it keeps the filters clean twice as long, compared to a unit that pulls air in from one side only. My other purifier draws air from only one side, and the filter needs to be cleaned ever week. These filters can go for a couple weeks easily before I vacuum them, just to keep them at top performance. They are very easy to vacuum, taking only about a minute to do both. Features are pretty basic, with a simple timer and fan speed. There is an aromatherapy option, which is simple to use, but I have not tested.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So Far, So Good
reviews.reviewText: I want to preface this review by saying I've never owned an air purifier before and have nothing to compare it to. It's packaged securely and the instructions were clear. There really wasn't anything to set up or install because the filters are already inside. It turned on easily and the different settings work. I can't tell if it's actually doing anything or not though. I'm hopeful. I suppose I wouldn't be sure about any model I bought, but I have no reason to believe this isn't helping. Based on my research it would have been nice to include an extra filter or to have the screen on it that can tell you just how effective it is being. That being said I'm pretty happy to have it running in our bedroom because I'm hoping it might help with nighttime congestion. It can get pretty noisy depending on the setting you select, but it also mentions that. The sleep setting is low enough to not be an issue in our bedroom when trying to sleep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice as long as it lasts!
reviews.reviewText: Very nice and quiet! Seems to work pretty well, too! I like the double sided intake design! As long as it lasts, this thing is great for small rooms!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For a small machine, it works really well! It it pretty quiet and does the job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Maybe it helps, maybe it doesn't
reviews.reviewText: I don't know, I'm skeptical. I have no proof this actually improves air quality. Is it an expensive placebo?I've had it in my nursery for awhile, near the dirty diaper wet bag. I don't think it's made it smell any better. True, I haven't put any oils in it, but I wanted to test the actual purifying powers, not just the strength of my essential oils to cover up the scent.Objectively, there are some neat features about this machine, like the dual air intake on the sides and the diffusing scent part on the exit. In the product description, there are easy instructions of how to order replacement filters.I guess even if I don't fully trust it, it makes an okay white noise machine and diffuser combination.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My husband and I love this little air filter. It is super light-weight, arrived very well-packaged, and is easy to use. I like that it can also be used as a sort of diffused. It came with extra pads for putting the essential oil on. I wish the air purifier had come with a couple extra filters instead of just the two that were already inside it. It would also be nice if there were a display of the current air quality so we know it's doing its job. Otherwise, great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love How Quiet It Is...Great Quality Filters...
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is a nice double ir intake design. I like the the size of this and how quiet it is, especially in nighttime mode.The lcd panel is easy to read and the touch controls gave me no issues. I will however update this review after using it next to the litter box.My current air purifier doesn't stop the odor. I will recommend this one though because if the reasons I mentioned above.
